fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
Implementation of the Single Market 
Implementation of Employment Rights and Policies 
Recognition of Professional Qualifications 
Application of the Services Directive
organisation_name: European Federation for Complementary and Alternative Medicine (EFCAM)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Interlocutor with the Commission on behalf of CAM professionals, Interlocutor with MEPs on behalf of CAM, participant in CHRODIS, participant in EIP AHA, participant in relevant events and conferences on EU health policy and programmes, employment rights, internal market rights policies and activities, research and Regional policy and activities.
goals__remit: To gain equality of access to complementary and sustainable healthcare, CAM, for all European citizens, and to gain the formal right to practice and work in CAM for all appropriately trained CAM professionals
